New Records: Bobby Witt Jr. hit 100 RBIs for the season
Key Match Events: Bobby Witt Jr. hit a solo homer in the first inning
Bobby Witt Jr. hit a sacrifice fly in the fifth
Bobby Witt Jr. hit a run-scoring double in the sixth
The Royals scored twice in the fifth
The Pirates scored their lone run in the fifth
Bobby Witt Jr.’s RBI double in the sixth that was misplayed by Cruz made it 5-1
Post-Match Reflections: The Royals won for the seventh time in nine games since a seven-game losing streak
The Royals assured themselves of their first winning season since 2015 by raising their record to 82-67
The Royals had five stolen bases, three by Maikol Garcia and two by Kyle Isbel
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Royals are 2½-game lead over Minnesota for the second AL wild card
The Royals are trailing first-place Cleveland by three games in the AL Central
